author: frank@example.com
content: One tip for React performance is to use `React.memo` for pure components.

author: grace@example.com
content: Also try splitting components with dynamic `import()` so only the necessary code loads.

author: henry@example.com
content: Rust is nice, but compile times are slower than Go. Depends on your priorities.

author: ivy@example.com
content: Async/await is cleaner for sequential code, but I still use Promises for `.map()` over arrays.
